blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Sweepstakes Winner!
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2lFD3DE

by Sebcstianstan

Fresh out of high school at the age of 17 and Eugenia has no idea what she wants to do with her life. A month has passed since her gradation and she still hasn’t done anything. College is an option but Eugenias social anxiety isn’t letting her perform well and not to mention her on going depression. So when she reads about a sweepstakes that would let her live with TONY STARK in the avengers tower in New York!! for six months!! Well she couldn’t miss out on that opportunity she definitely isn’t running from her problems.

Eugenia is a Latina who lived and grew up in Casa Blanca, California (a bad neighborhood riddled with gang violence although she thankfully was never apart of that life). Expect Spanish. Also memes and self deprecating jokes aka millennial humor! Also songs lots of songs Eugenia can’t go without music its her escape.

Maybe one or two chapters before she gets the sweepstakes so that I can give you more insight to her life and what made her the way she is.

this fic will most likely run for a couple thousand words maybe 30,000 most likely more. don’t have a number on the amount of chapters I will write.

Words: 1002, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Other
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Original Female Character(s), Original Characters, Happy Hogan, Steve Rogers, Sam Wilson, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Matt Murdock, Franklin “Foggy” Nelson, Frank Castle, Ceiling vent clint, Wanda Maximoff, Peter Parker, Wade Wilson, Tyler the Creator, Stephen Strange, Wong (Marvel), Pepper Potts, James “Bucky” Barnes, Original Female Character(s) of Color, Vision, Ant-Man
  • Relationships: Tony Stark & Original Female Character(s), happy hogan & original female character
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Age of Ultron (Movie), Pre-Captain America: Civil War (Movie), idk if Tony is going to be a father figure or a sugar daddy?, Dad!Tony, Father-Daughter Relationship, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Past Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Pepper left, Stucky - Freeform, Avengers Family, latina, Post-Captain America: The Winter Soldier

tags: i love my gay cat daughter
summary:
Yesyesyesyesyesyes!
Imagine Tony getting so fucking excited when he first meets Shuri because he kept in touch with T'Challa...
body:
Yesyesyesyesyesyes!

Imagine Tony getting so fucking excited when he first meets Shuri because he kept in touch with T'Challa after Siberia and Shuri was their main conversation topic.Tony became her biggest fanboy because she sounds so brilliant.

Imagine Shuri finding Tony passed out from exhaustion on the floor in his lab when she and T'Challa come visit and she is Concerned ™. T'Challa just rubs his forehead and is like “this fucking idiot, good lord” and she becomes a part of the Tony Stark Protection Squad because this idiot can not take care of himself.

Imagine Shuri and Tony developing a new technology with the help of Dr. Strange. This tech basically involves blocking magic waves from entering your brain. It comes in the form of a collar or earrings. Shuri came up with the idea after hearing what went down with Maximoff.


Imagine Shuri and FRIDAY talking about Tony as if he’s not in the room just to annoy him. Shuri: “He never gets enough sleep, does he?” FRIDAY: “Certainly not, miss. And his eating habits are very poor, are they not?”.

Imagine Shuri and Tony making suits for eachoter. Tony incorporated Shuri’s personal AI in there, too. Shuri named her T.I.A (T'Challa is a loser) and I think I have an idea of who might have invented Tony’s new suit…

Imagine Shuri meeting Peter in the middle of a scolding. Apparently, he got into a fight with a fellow named Flash. Peter is beaten up, with a busted lip and black eye scraped knuckles, yet he still stands with fire in his eyes. Shuri decides that she likes him.

Imagine Shuri and Peter having sleepovers and making pillow forts and being Meme Bros ™ (oh shit, that’s what I’m calling them from now on B Y E).

Imagine Shuri meeting MJ and being completely smitten with her. Tony sees that, and being the little shit that he is, plays matchmaker. Arranging dates, sending Shuri and MJ gifts in the name of the other, and making sure they always end up alone in the room they’re sitting. When he accidentally walks in on them kissing, he knows his job is done.

Imagine Shuri’s first Pride parade. With hair dyed in the colors of the rainbow flag, face painted in the lesbian flag colors on one side and bisexual flag on the other, holding MJ’s hand, whose face is also painted with the colors of the lesbian flag.

Imagine Shuri blasting homophobic protesters. Nothing serious, but some of them did ended up naked because of the blasts. Serves them right. She still gets a lecture from T'Challa afterwards, but it was worth it because Tony mouthed a ‘good job’ and baked her cookies, so its okay.

blog.name: broadgays
blog.description:
☆

my career has been a glide path of uninterrupted sucess, and from it you can draw very few lessons

summary: non avengers stevetony au in which steve isn't captain america, but actually peters cool uncle that raises peter as his own...
body: non avengers stevetony au in which steve isn’t captain america, but actually peters cool uncle that raises peter as his own after his parents die, while he’s still in art school. and then as peter grows up and develops his interest for science and engineering, in his freshman year he enters a competition to intern as tony starks lab assistant, who still quits making weapons after afghanistan and dedicates his life to clean energy and philanthropic work, and actually wins. steve, now a junior art history professor at columbia, is so fucking proud of peter and is over the moon for him, while also having harbored a crush on tony since he read one of his new york times’ op eds on helping to restore the lives of refugees in syria. throughout peters internship, him and tony form a really close, mentor/mentee relationship and he decides to invite tony to meet steve after a few months of interning for him. and obviously, as peter had hoped, the moment steve opens the door to their apartment and sets eyes on tony and tony looks at steve, the two fall hopelessly in love. over the next few weeks the two constantly pine for eachother, tony constantly asking peter if his “stunning dad” wouldn’t like to come to midtown and join them on their lunch break and peter just smiling softly as an answer. eventually they get their heads out of their asses, after driving peter insane with their obliviousness. half a year later they move in together and peter officially has the best dads on the planet, which steve just nods his head at as he leans down to kiss tony. someone write this please !

body:
